questions.question: Pick the option which does not determine the texture of igneous rocks.

answers.d: Arrangement of the constituents within the body of the rock

explanations.a: Explanation :The term texture is defined as the mutual relationship of different mineralogical constituents in a rock. It is determined by the size, shape and arrangement of these constituents within the body of the rock.

questions.question: What is the absolute reverse of porphyritic texture?

explanations.a: Explanation : Poikilitic texture is characterized with the presence of fine-grained crystals within the body of large sized crystals. In other words, it is just the reverse of the porphyritic textures.

questions.question: What is the term when augite has inclusions of plagioclase felspar?

explanations.d: Explanation :When the host mineral is identified as augite and the inclusions are of plagioclase felspars, the poiklitic texture is further distinguished as ophitic.
